TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将 的属性值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of a property of a to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 类将属性的值（ 如 或）绑定 到在参数化 SQL 查询、业务对象方法或筛选表达式中使用的参数。You can use the class to bind the value of a property, such as or , to a parameter that is used in a parameterized SQL query, business object method, or filtering expression. 除了从类继承的属性以外，类还提供两个属性 ： 和 。The class provides two properties in addition to those inherited from the class: and . 属性标识要 绑定到的实例， 属性标识 类从中检索值的的公共属性 。The property identifies which instance to bind to and the property identifies the public property of the from which the class retrieves a value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象将 控件中显示的数据绑定 到 声明性方案中的控件的所选值。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 对象将添加到 窗体上的控件的集合，并对应于属性中的 " @Title " 占位符文本 。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数创建的对象 将用其所有属性的默认值初始化。A object that is created with the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 和 属性将初始化为 。The and properties are initialized to . 此外，将属性初始化为，将属性初始化为，将属性初始化为 ，并将 属性初始化为 `null` 。In addition, the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , and the property is initialized to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何 使用 构造函数创建对象。The following code shows how to create a object with the constructor. 对象将控件的 属性绑定 到参数化的 SQL 查询，该查询检索控件中显示的数据 。The object binds the property of a control to a parameterized SQL query that retrieves data that is displayed in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是一个受保护的复制构造函数，用于克隆 实例。The constructor is a protected copy constructor that is used to clone a instance. 对象的值 （包括 、 、 和 属性）全部传输到新的实例。The values of the object, including the , , , and properties, are all transferred to the new instance.

summary.span: 指定 对象绑定到的控件名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the control that the object binds to.

span.span: A that represents the name of a Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个必需的属性，用于标识 对象在运行时绑定到的实例。The property is a required property that identifies the instance that the object binds to at run time. 通常， 设置和 属性以使 方法正确绑定到控件。Typically, the and properties are set for the method to correctly bind to a control. 如果未设置 属性，则在 调用时，方法将引发 异常。If you do not set the property, the method throws an exception when called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象将 控件中显示的数据绑定 到 声明性方案中的控件的所选值。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 对象将添加到 窗体上的控件的集合，并对应于属性中的 " @Title " 占位符文本 。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 和 属性以标识 对象绑定到的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the and properties to identify the control that a object is bound to. 该示例 使用值填充控件。The example populates a control with values. 控件的属性 用于筛选由控件检索 并由控件显示的数据 。The property of the control is used to filter data retrieved by a control and displayed by a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/CS/webform1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/VB/webform1vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用方法时，对象都会尝试绑定到 对象和属性 。The object attempts to bind to the object and property every time the method is called. 方法返回控件的属性的值，该属性由和属性的组合标识 。The method returns the value of the control's property that is identified by the combination of the and properties. 绑定到控件的属性值时，类从不使用从继承的属性。The class never uses the property, which is inherited from , when binding to a control's property value. > [!NOTE] > 在此方法的实现中，将 `context` 忽略参数。In this implementation of the method, the `context` parameter is ignored. 如果 `control` 参数为 `null`，则返回 `null`。If the `control` parameter is `null`, `null` is returned.

does not return the specified control.

summary.span: 获取或设置由 对象绑定到的 属性标识的控件的属性名。

value.span: 一个 ，表示 绑定到的控件的属性名。

span.span: A that represents the name of a control's property that the binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识 由 对象在运行时绑定到的属性标识的对象的公共属性。The property identifies the public property of the object identified by the property that the object binds to at run time. 可以设置为简单字符串（如 "SelectedValue"）或使用 语法标识复杂控件属性的表达式。 can be set to a simple string, such as "SelectedValue", or an expression using syntax to identify complex control properties. 虽然 属性是可选的，但通常 会将和属性都设置为 正确绑定到控件。While the property is optional, typically both and properties are set for the method to correctly bind to a control. 如果设置 属性，但不设置 属性，则 方法会尝试使用 属性来标识默认 属性。If you set the property but not the property, the method attempts to use the attribute to identify a default property. (控制作者负责指定此属性 ) 。如果此操作失败，则会 引发 异常。(It is the responsibility of control authors to specify this attribute.) If this fails, throws an exception. 下表标识了哪些 ASP.NET 控件修饰属性和 属性。The following table identifies which ASP.NET controls decorate properties with the attribute. |控制Control|属性Property| |-------------|--------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象将 控件中显示的数据绑定 到 声明性方案中的控件的所选值。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to bind data displayed in a control to the selected value of a control in a declarative scenario. 控件派生自 控件。The control derives from the control. 对象将添加到 窗体上的控件的集合，并对应于属性中的 " @Title " 占位符文本 。The object is added to the collection of the control on the form, and corresponds to the "@Title" placeholder text in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 和 属性以标识 对象绑定到的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the and properties to identify the control that a object is bound to. 该示例 使用值填充控件。The example populates a control with values. 控件的属性 用于筛选由控件检索 并由控件显示的数据 。The property of the control is used to filter data retrieved by a control and displayed by a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/CS/webform1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter_2/VB/webform1vb.aspx#1)]
